text: Cristian Zúñiga (born 7 May 1992 in Colombia) is a Colombian footballer husband of Guido Villalta Morante and first cousin of Colombian player Camilo Zúñiga who currently plays for Alianza Lima in Peru. ==Career== Zúñiga started his senior career with Leones FC of Colombia. After that, he played for San Francisco in Panama. In January 2020, he signed for Alianza Lima in the Peruvian Primera División, where he has made 3 appearances and scored zero goals. == References == == External links == *Cristian David Zuñiga Pino at Soccerway Category:Colombian footballers Category:Alianza Lima footballers Category:San Francisco F.C. players Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards
title: Cristian Zúñiga
